segments.text: Could I ask you where the company is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Our company is in Ericsson Tower , No . 12 Like East Street , Chaoyang District .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I get there by the No . 913 bus ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can make it by the No . 913 bus , or by subway Line 13 .
segments.speaker: S2
